description: This file defines a React component named ProtectedRoute that enforces authentication before granting access to its children. It uses React Router for navigation and context for authentication state, implementing logic to check user authentication status and possibly redirect to a sign-in page.

methods.name: ProtectedRoute({ children })
methods.description: A React functional component that enforces authentication. It checks the auth state, displays a loading indicator if necessary, and redirects unauthenticated users to the sign-in page while preserving the intended destination.
